query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sanctions_designations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  entityId INT NOT NULL,
  entityType ENUM('bank', 'individual', 'organization', 'vessel', 'other') NOT NULL,
  entityName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  entityNameAr VARCHAR(255),
  sanctioningBody ENUM('ofac', 'un', 'eu', 'uk', 'other') NOT NULL,
  sanctionType ENUM('sdn', 'sectoral', 'blocking', 'asset_freeze', 'travel_ban', 'other') NOT NULL,
  designationDate DATE NOT NULL,
  expirationDate DATE,
  sdnListNumber VARCHAR(50),
  programCode VARCHAR(50),
  reason TEXT,
  reasonAr TEXT,
  legalBasis TEXT,
  generalLicenseNumber VARCHAR(50),
  generalLicenseExpiry DATE,
  windDownAuthorized BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  windDownDeadline DATE,
  status ENUM('active', 'expired', 'delisted', 'modified') DEFAULT 'active',
  sourceUrl VARCHAR(500),
  sourceDocumentId INT,
  confidenceRating ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') DEFAULT 'A',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_entity (entityId, entityType),
  INDEX idx_body (sanctioningBody),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);

  sanctioningBody ENUM('ofac', 'un', 'eu', 'uk', 'other') NOT NULL,
  sanctionType ENUM('sdn', 'sectoral', 'blocking', 'asset_freeze', 'travel_ban', 'other') NOT NULL,
  designationDate DATE NOT NULL,
  expirationDate DATE,
  sdnListNumber VARCHAR(50),
  programCode VARCHAR(50),
  reason TEXT,
  reasonAr TEXT,
  legalBasis TEXT,
  generalLicenseNumber VARCHAR(50),
  generalLicenseExpiry DATE,
  windDownAuthorized BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE,
  windDownDeadline DATE,
  status ENUM('active', 'expired', 'delisted', 'modified') DEFAULT 'active',
  sourceUrl VARCHAR(500),
  sourceDocumentId INT,
  confidenceRating ENUM('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') DEFAULT 'A',
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_entity (entityId, entityType),
  INDEX idx_body (sanctioningBody),
  INDEX idx_status (status)
);
